long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Master: Efficient Browser Tab Management.

Overview:
Tab Master is designed to streamline your browsing experience by offering powerful tab management features. Whether you're a multitasker juggling numerous tabs or just someone looking to keep your browser organized, Tab Master is the ideal solution. From automatically grouping tabs by their domain to saving and restoring entire browsing sessions, it simplifies tab management, enhances productivity, and helps you maintain a clutter-free workspace.

Key Features:

Group Tabs by Category:

Automatically sorts your open tabs into groups based on their domains. This feature helps you organize related content, making navigation between similar tabs easier.
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+1

Save Current Tab Session:

Save your current browsing session with all open tabs. This feature ensures that you can easily continue your work later without losing any important tabs after closing the browser.
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+2

Restore Saved Tab Session:

Restore a previously saved tab session. This feature reopens all the tabs you had saved, allowing you to pick up right where you left off.
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+3

Close Inactive Tabs:

Automatically closes tabs that have been inactive for a set amount of time. This helps reduce clutter in your tab bar and improves your browser's performance by freeing up resources.
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+4

How to Use:
Manual Controls: Click on the Tab Master extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the popup interface. From here, you can manually access all features with the click of a button.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Use the provided shortcuts for quick and efficient tab management without needing to open the extension popup.

Example Usage:

Group Tabs: Press Ctrl+Shift+1 to automatically group all your open tabs by their domains, creating an organized tab bar.

Save Session: Before closing your browser, press Ctrl+Shift+2 to save your current session, ensuring that your tabs are restored when you come back.

Restore Session: After reopening your browser, press Ctrl+Shift+3 to restore your previously saved session and continue from where you left off.

Close Inactive Tabs: Use Ctrl+Shift+4 to automatically close tabs that haven't been used in a while, clearing up your tab bar and improving performance.



Tab Master makes it easy to manage your tabs, save sessions, and declutter your browsing workspace, all while prioritizing your privacy.


Privacy Policy:
Your privacy is our top priority. Tab Master does not collect or store any personal data. All tab management activities are performed locally on your device, ensuring your browsing information stays private.
